title: Window Coverings, Shaker-style Cabinetry, Grey Vinyl Tile Flooring
posting_body: We are currently offering virtual tours.
Please use the link in this ad to visit our website and set up a tour today or give us a call!
Welcome to The Commons at Windsor Gardens
This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1210 Sq.
Ft.
The Commons at Windsor Gardens features outstanding amenities and stylish apartments in Norwood, MA.
Select apartments include hardwood flooring, stainless steel appliances, and an in-home washer and dryer.
Enjoy access to on-site amenities like tennis courts, volleyball courts, swimming pools, and a fitness facility.
With easy access to I-95, Route 128 and a Commuter Rail stop right on the premises, Boston commuters can walk out their front door and be whisked into South Station in just 25 minutes.
Located on Walpole Street / Route 1A in historic Norwood, The Commons at Windsor Gardens is just a short distance from many dining, nightlife, shopping, and recreational destinations.
Schedule a tour today and experience stylish apartment living in Norwood.
We are currently offering self-guided tours.
Features:

Dryer, Walk-In Closets, Parquet Wood Flooring, Disposal, Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Washer and Dryer Connections, Washer, Shaker-style Cabinetry, Heat, Range, Air Conditioner, View, Vaulted Ceilings, Ceramic Tile Flooring, Window Coverings, Faux Quartz Countertops, Microwave, Patio, Grey Vinyl Tile Flooring, Balcony/Patio, Hardwood Flooring, Washer and Dryer In Home, Black Appliances, White Appliances, Stainless Steel Appliances
*Apartment amenities not available in every home.
Community amenities may require an additional fee.
Community Amenities:

Stainless steel appliances, Fitness center, Wood plank flooring, Moving services with Move Matcher, Clubroom with fireplace and kitchen, Multiple finish packages available, Tennis courts, MBTA Commuter rail stop on-premises, Smart home package, Dog park, Swimming pool, Pet-friendly, Short term leases available, Furnished apartments available, Laundry facilities, Playground, Resident app, Sundeck, Washer and dryer, Deposit free with Rhino, Patio/Balcony, Black appliances, Build credit score with RentTrack, Volleyball courts, On-site daycare center (privately operated)
